alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:19AM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 2 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Fayette, Greene, and Westmoreland Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Please report snow or ice accumulations by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh.
